Language is SPANISH. THere is NO English in the movie at all.

Wrong, only the titles and navigation are strictly in Spanish. Simply select the language/subtitle option from the main menu (item #3), pick the first language option (not Castellano) and the second subtitle option (no subtitles) and enjoy the movie in english
